summary: A container class that aggregates all results produced by a multimodal alignment model, including optional contrastive loss, image‑to‑text and text‑to‑image similarity scores, the corresponding embeddings, and the raw outputs of the underlying text and vision sub‑models. It also offers a lightweight way to represent these fields as a simple tuple.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications such as cross‑modal retrieval, ranking, or further training steps to easily access loss values, similarity logits, and embeddings in a unified structure, simplifying integration and post‑processing of multimodal model outputs.
